TopicTitle: Pet project that become great thing :-) the Sputnik

Articles.Content:
I heard that Russian Government wasn't even interested in satellites, the Sputnik was Pet project of Korolyev while he was Working on R-7 Rocket with was developed for military purpose.

I thing that many cool thing was Pet project for example the KSP that we all here adore and love to play ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Was initially a pet project ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
IsnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t Sputnik just a test payload for R-7 military project?

They were supposed to test the rocket. Nobody rly cared about the payload, cause that wasn't part of the test. So he asked about puting sputnik ontop of it and nobody interfered.

It only gained any attemtion after the US press reacted with amazement and kinda paniced. Nobody in charge rly saw that kind of interest coming.

I guess the same applies for KSP ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Sputnik was a test payload for a military project. America reacted the way it did because the Russians showed that they could hit anywhere on the planet. Far from a "pet project." I don't know where you heard that. Not so innocent.

Not to mention that there were a lot of failures of the R-7 before that flight.
